title: MORE Graded T205s For Sale - ALL CARDS ARE SOLD
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: MORE Graded T205s For Sale - ALL CARDS ARE SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello All!

Here are some T205s from a recent purchase!  ALL are graded PSA 2.  For what it’s worth, I think that these are some REALLY SHARP PSA2s…  Any that do not sell will be listed on eBay in a week or two…

ALL cards are Blue Piedmont Factory 25 backs, unless noted. 

BECK – Paper loss on reverse - $27 - SOLD
DOYLE – I see NO creases – [STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE] SOLD
EWING – I see NO creases – [STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE] SOLD
FERGUSON – I see NO creases – $35 - SOLD{B]
GRAHAM (Black Signature) – Paper loss on reverse – $27 - SOLD
HAUSER – I see NO creases – $35 - SOLD
MILLER (John “D”) – I see NO creases – $35 - SOLD

Please message me if you are interested.  I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

(All prices are “Net to Me” and include shipping.)

PayPal – Friends or Family is preferred OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you for your consideration!
PSA is really tough on those back stains.  The fronts are awesome.  Good luck with the sale.

THANK YOU!!!

If I could build an entire set of "PSA 2s" that looked like these, I would be THRILLED!!!!

[quote name="EvilKing00" post=1597487]PM sent[/QUOTE]

Payment received - cards will ship tomorow!
They are all gone!  THANKS, EVERYONE, for your interest!
